channel.title: Quoc Phong Nguyen
channel.description: Recent content on Quoc Phong Nguyen

item.title: Education
item.description: Doctor of Philosophy, Computer Science (2013 - 2018) National University of Singapore, Singapore SMA3 (Singapore-MIT Alliance) Fellowship. Supervised by Associate Professor Bryan Kian Hsiang Low and Professor Patrick Jaillet. Thesis: An Alternative Information-Theoretic Criterion for Active Learning. Bachelor of Computer Engineering (Minor in Statistics) (2009 - 2013) National University of Singapore, Singapore Lee Kuan Yew Gold Medal for the best graduate throughout the course of study.
